TopicTitle: Forum: Icon to indicate I'm subscribed to a thread

Articles.Content:
More specifically, the old forum topic list showed an icon that indicated that I had already subscribed to a topic, in addition to a separate icon that showed me that I had contributed to the topic.  With the new forum software, it looks like there's a star on the left of the topic title to indicate I contributed to the topic, but I don't see a way to tell at a glance that I've already subscribed.

Now, as far as I can tell, I have to click through to the topic to find out if I'm already following it.  That's a really poor workflow, particularly when trying to rebuild the lost subscription list.  If there's some sort of option that can provide a visual cue without having to click through, that'd help.
Forum suggestions go in the Kerbal Network subforum, moving.
